1.content:
Simply put, the options below are separate story lines different writers can get in on and create on their own, or with help if they so desired.

Pick one and let the fat times roll~!
1.title: New Game!

11.content:
- Angel's Food Cake: Can focus on Angel!Flonne or Fallen Angel!Flonne, in this scenerio, Flonne has taken up on a rather ravenous addiction to sweets curtosy of Etna. The results aren't exactly noticeable and Flonne even says that she most likely won't gain weight...that is, until an odd snack food finally does her metabolism in and results in a rounded bulge along the Angel/Fallen Angel's middle.

- Etna's Quest for Breast: Tired of being the "flat chested shrew" Laharl's always calling her (among other things regarding a flat chest), Etna feels it's high time she eared some respect by getting her breasts to enlarge a bit and maybe improve on her figure.

- Phantom Blubber: A scenerio focusing on Marona and weight gain. Rather clean cut with a plot that's entirely up to the current writer/reader. What sort of adventure will you take Marona on through her path to plumpdom? It's all up to you...

- High Calorie Teacher ~ Miss Raspberyl: Taking place in the post-game side-story "Raspberyl Chapter" of Disgaea 3's DLC content, Beryl has become a teacher for the Academy as a result of growing tired of what Mao was doing as the Dean (or Overlord, in this case). In this scene, there Beryl has taken to her role as teacher quite nicely and sets to expand on the number of students and show them the way with her knowledge as a Delinquent. Along the way the Delinquent Teacher becomes the head of a Cooking Club to show her students how to run a Bake Sale at an upcoming Evil Academy Event. Of course...there's always a chance that the snacks baked tend to go...other places than onto the table...
11.title: Netherworld Story 1

111.content: Choose which Flonne you want to focus the story one~
111.title: Angel's Food Cake ~ Character Selection

112.content: In which way do her breast get bigger?
112.title: So  how does she obtain boobs?

1122.content:
It was a beautiful and calm evening in the netherworld realm, however at the castle of Overlord Laharl there was much terror. Every Prinni tried to find a hide spot from Demonlord Etna, who was mad as hell. The reason for this was, that Laharl called her flatchest. So the Prinnis hide themself to avoid the wrath of their master. But Etna didn't hunt them down to calm her anger. She went to her room, closed the door with all her might and laid down on her bed. "Stupid prince and his insults. I'm equaly strong as him, but he still calls me names for my figure. If there is a way to change this, I will use it." She looked around her room and noticed, that a book fell out of the bookshelf and laid opened on the floor. So she rose up to put the book back in the shelf, however she didn't put it back, because the pages she saw, wakened up her interst. "Mh, a genie, which grants any wish you give it. This could be usefull." Etna started to pack up her items and equipment for her journey. "Well time to search for this wishgranter." She sneaked out the castle and went to the dimensiongate.

So started her journey to get her dreams fullfilled. On her way Etna overcame many hazards. She fought on her quest against demons, dragons and some angels. But after one and half week she reached her goal. It was a cave with many traps inside. However those weren't a obstacle for Etna. At the end of the cave there was a padestol with a small bottle standing on it. She picked it up and rubbed it. After a second the genie came out. It was a muscular man.

"I'm the genie of the bottle, who grants 3 wishes for his master." said the genie.
"3 wishes? In the book were one wish per person mentioned, but who cares." Etna responded.
The genie ignored this and asked: "What is your first wish, my master?"
"Well, I wish for.."
1122.title: The quest for wishes.

11221.content:
"... breast the size of watermelons." Etna wished.
"Your wish is granted." The genie responed.

Soon after the genie spoke his words, Etna felt something pushing against her brastrap and looked down. She saw her boobs growing at slow but steady pace. Etna poked her breast to feel, if they were real and was met with the feeling of flesh. However she wasn't overjoyed about this and looked at the genie again.

"Hey buddy, I don't want to spent the rest of the day here just to grow some breast." Etna said in anger.
"What do you mean, my master? Didn't I grant you your wish?" The genie questioned.
"Well yes, you did. But could you increase their growth speed a lot?" Etna answered.
"I can do it, but it is dangerous, because they can overshoot their size and you might feel something, what you maybe don't like." said the genie while scratching his head.
"Just do it. I don't care, if they get bigger than wanted." Etna said and stomped on the ground.
"You're the master" was his answer and the genie snapped his fingers.

Suddenly Etna felt something strange in her tennisballsized boobs. It felt like hands were moving under her skin massaging her breast but also pushing her skin and flesh. Her breast grew like a ballon filing up by a air. She had grin on her face, but it faded away and was a replaced by slutty face. Her mouth was wide open with her tongue hanging out and moaning loudly. The reason for this was, that the feeling in her breast gave her so much pleasure, as if she had sex in the way she wanted. And this pleasure got only better with every increace of her breast size, which grew at a rapid speed. At the size of honeymelons Etna fall on her butt and had an orcasm, because her pleasure reached the climaxpoint and her legs lost all their strength. She also started fondling her boobs without even noticing. Three minutes after this her brastrap broke, which showed her now basketball chest in all their glory. Everything felt like an eternity for Etna, who was lost in pleasure. This continued for 8 minutes, while she had three more orgasms. The last one being the strongest, when her chest reached their goal. She was exhausted and panting with her breast moving up and down with every breath she took. After two minutes of resting she looked down. Her eyes widened, when she saw her breast, which were the size of huge pumpking, but they were firm and didn't sag. She stood up, while her breast reached below her waist. Because of this she had to lean against the wall.

"WOW, you were right, when you said, that they overshoot. Man are they heavy." Etna said.
"Do wish to shrink them, my master?" the genie questioned.
"Nope, somehow I like this size. I just wish, that my ass was the size of volleyballs with fitting hips to balance my breast out." Etna said as a comment, but realised, what she had said. "Oh, no."
"Your wish is granted."the genie replied.

However within seconds her ass balloned out and her hips widend to their desired size. Etna was...
11221.title: Dream sorta come true.

choices: Onward! Evil Academy's First Bake Sale Club...Thing!
114.content: There are more than a few options here. The first focuses on the bake sale idea, the second is a freewrite allowing the writer to go on with the wg story however they wish, and the last is about the same as the first only focusing on the original Raspberyl rather than her 'Teacher' variant from the DLC.
114.title: High Calorie Teacher - Episode Selection

115.content:
-Sumo Flonne: Flonne saw a poster for a Female Sumo Wrester Tournament to win a prize. Should Flonee began eating food or use Magic to enter the Female Sumo Wrester Tournament?

-Pregnant Asagi: Asagi fell into a magic lake and cause Asagi become pregnant. Can Asagi give birth, or find a spell to remove the pregnant on Asagi?
115.title: More Story Ideas

choices: Asagi Wars ~ Can I Really Be The Mommy?
12.content:
- Egg of The Crane: A pregnancy oriented scenerio focusing on Asuka Cranekick, one of Raspberyl's close friends and a top delinquent at Evil Academy. In this scene, after defeating a student in Evil Academy, Asuka sends them her usually 'get well soon'. However, unlike the other visits...the demon sends a little gift back...

- Massive Militant: A weight gain scenerio focusing mostly on Salvatore the Magnificent. In this scene, the ruthless and domineering senior sets her sights on gaining access to section of the Junior Hall of the Academy, an area that's been widely unnoticed by many and was thought to have been as much of a myth as seniors. However, Salvatore plans to change this by meeting this new opponents head on and showing them how the upperclassmen roll. And yet, ever so slowly, the ruthless woman is slowly gaining a much more...plushier figure...

- A Robust Mission: A weight gain scenerio following the "robust princess" Sapphire. In this scene, taking place after the events of Disgaea 3, Sapphire finds that Almaz's interest in her has 'dropped' over the past few days and sets to reclaim her husband's sights by changing her appearance a bit. Although, all it takes to fudge this rather innocent endeavor up is the current word of mouth around the Academy...mostly pretaining to how 'Big Girls are the next big thing'.

- Asagi Wars ~ Can I Really Be The Mommy?: A pregnancy scenerio focusing around Asagi and her exploits to be the Main Character of her own game. Asagi finds herself in yet another situation where she yearns for the perks of being a 'Main Character' and, in an odd and suspiciously convenient turn of events a demon is able to grant her that wish...for a cost, of course. That cost being in the form of a steadily expanding womb...
12.title: Netherworld Story 2

choices: A bottle of pills guaranteed to make one glow with health
A creature that jumped out and attacked
121.content:
It was an average day for Asuka Cranekick as she headed back to her door room after a long day of delinquency. Reaching her door she noticed that there was a small gift wrapped box in front of it. Grabbing the box by it's bow as she went inside she was wondering who got her such a nice looking gift as it was unusual for anyone but close friends to give each other gifts in Evil Academy.

         Laying on her bed Asuka began to open her present, inside the box was â€¦
121.title: The Egg of The Crane

choices: While sleeping her pregnancy progressed rapidly
Her pregnancy progressed at the normal speed
1213.content: A sneak attack. As soon as the box was opened a small creature jumped out claws bared and aiming for her face. Deflecting the attack with her balled fist Asuka leaped from her bed to her sword not noticing the creature casting some kind of spell behind her. âAll right my job is done I'm out of here,â the creature shouted as Asuka turned about, sword ready to strike. â Nothing personal lady just hired to hide in the box and scare ya.â Letting the creature go as she is well aware of students' pranking her as revenge for beating them in fights and her delinquency in general Asuka putting the event behind her as a deliquent would decided to get her homework done and head to sleep.
1213.title: A creature that jumped out and attacked

choices: Gave in to her cravings and ate with her friends
Left for class and missed her friends' meeting
12132.content:
Waking up the next morning Asuka feeling nauseous and rushed to her bathroom to empty her stomach. After dry-heaving several times to ensure that nothing else came up Asuka went back to her usual morning routine not wanting to be late for her meeting with Raspberyl and Kyoko for breakfast. While slightly concerned that she was coming down with something, Asuka decided that it wasn't enough to call in sick and pressed on with her plans for the day.

         Once she arrived at the cafeteria Asuka noticed that she had arrived a bit early and resolved to wait for her friends before eating. After a few minutes though the smell of the wonderful food and the sight of others enjoying it caused her resolve to waver and she â€¦
12132.title: Her pregnancy progressed at the normal speed

choices: What each of them did yesterday
121321.content: Hearing her stomach rumble Asuka decided that her friends would forgive her for beginning breakfast without them. Heading to the end of the line Asuka was forced to wait for what felt like an eternity as many students felt free to cut in line. Upon reaching the counter Asuka was about to order her usual meal but changed her mind when the smell of the other meals wafted by. Deciding to order a conglomeration of what she smelled Asuka was surprised bu the disgusted face the cook made after she described her order. While waiting for her order Asuka noticed that her friends had finally arrived and went back to their table to begin the breakfast meeting. During the meeting the topic turns to â€¦
121321.title: Gave in to her cravings and ate with her friends

choices: Adipose Aristocrat ~ Into the Vault of Gluttons
125.content:
- Adipose Aristocrat ~ Into the Vault of Gluttons: A scenerio that follows an alternate continuity seperate from the one present in the original Disgaea 2. In this scenerio, Rozalin is in the place of Overlord as opposed to the 'Zenon' that was the Overlord in the original incarnation of the game. In this story, Rozalin gains wind of a legendary meat delicacy known as the Brahman Steak, said steak only being attainable through the traversing of the 'Glutton's Trap', a dangerous dungeon that few have ever managed to escape from. Being the meat-lover Rozalin is, the overlord sets out across the netherworld to be the first and only demon to taste it's goodness. Of course, along the way, she'll learn the very reason why that same dungeon was given the name it has...

- Asagi: The First Fatbender: An idea centered around the "Demon Asagi" incarnation that appeared in the Asagi Wars game mode in Prinny 2. In this scenerio, Demon Asagi rises from the depths Unlucky Swamp once more only to find the tournament that she was hoping to win has all but passed. Of course, since she arose from the swamp, the Shaman in the area believe her to be the avatar of their god of misfortune. Not one to turn away a chance to have servants, Demon Asagi settles into the cushiony life as a worshipped avatar, but all the while, seems oblivious to the ever fattening foods her servants are giving her...
125.title: More ideas through here~

choices: Breakfast time and Rozy's gorging herself.
Rozalin's belly can't wait for breakfast and wants something to snack on.
Treachory is afoot! A sudden challenger attacks the castle!
1251.content:
The position of Overlord is one of the highest known ranks a demon can hope to attain. Being something close to what humans would call a "king" or "queen" an Overlord takes hold of the chaos that is their Netherworld and uses their great power to mold it into what they see fit. Though many Overlord's exist to govern and rule over demons within their Netherworlds, only a few have stood out as truly unique among the bunches of noble demonic lords within the cosmos. The legend of Overlord Zenon is one of those unique demon nobles, her ruthlessness shaking the hearts of countless demons and adding 99 of them to the list of Overlords she has slaughtered. This is where one demoness' story begins, the tale of "Overlord Rozalin". Born with the soul of Zenon resting within her own, Rozalin held potential to become as strong an Overlord as she was in her previous life. Though, this fate would not be realized until sometime during her youth when a powerful Overlord attacked her village of the Snow Clan. In a fit of panic of seeing her loved ones brutally massacred, the dormant power of the Overlord God awakened as a frightful response to get rid of the powerful demon slaughtering her family and friends. Miraculously, the powerful Overlord was slain from Zenon's awakening but, the ending was far from happy. The demon's raid on the village was catastrophic, the vast majority of the village being wiped out in that short time the assailant ravaged the peaceful snowy residence.

Frightened, traumatized and alone, Rozalin wandered the ruins of her former home, unknowing of where she should go and where her fate would lie. Fortunately, Rozalin's life would not be spent in the voided state it was in. Followers of the very demon who attacked the village, and claimed to be the True Zenon, would arrive on the scene after realizing their master had yet to return from a raid on the village he set to destroy. Scouring the ruins of the village, the demons would not have to look far to find their late master dead within the destroyed remnants of an oriental mansion. Being the sole survivor wandering the ruins, Rozalin was the only suspect of the murder of "Zenon" however, instead of exacting revenge, the demons realized a disconcerting oddity. No mere child could defeat an Overlord . Was the culprit still at large...or was it truly Rozalin who killed "Zenon"? These questions buzzed through the minds of the demonic entourage but, no answer to them would readily reveal itself to them without further investigation. Realizing the dilemma of not having an Overlord, it was then decided by the leader of the search party that the lone Rozalin would be taken in and raised in "Zenon's" stead as the new Overlord...

Many years have passed since that fateful day...

With the rising of the morning, a new day on Rozalin's life as Overlord begins once again as her eyes flutter open from the fleeting loss of slumber that had once embraced her through the night. The blonde noble murmured lazily as she slowly arose from the soft covers of the immense canopy bed she rested within. With a soft yawn, Rozalin set forth to begin her day, seeing as her ability to sleep was now effectively lost to her. Sliding out of her bed, Rozalin made her way to the closest window and pulled open the crimson curtains to reveal the shining visage of the outside world. The view from her high rising window, while wonderful, showed her the unusual crystalline landscape below gleaming and sparkling in the rising sun. It often reminded her somewhat of the icy terrain back at her former home though, thinking back on it usually brought forth gruesome memories she had tried much of her childhood to repress and move forward from. Taking only another moment to bath her nightgown clad form in the morning rays of the sun, Rozalin's pointed ears perked as the sound of a rapping against the oak doors to her bedroom . It seems her servants were already active, their duties normally having them up earlier to rise than she ever could on her own.

"Lady Rozalin, are you awake?" A masculine voice called from behind the closed doors.

"Ah, yes. Just a moment and I'll be right with you." The blonde demoness responded, hastily making her way to her wardrobe to find a frilled rob of red silk to drape across her buxom frame. The nightwear Rozalin donned throughout the night was quite comfortable during these warm months though, she found it gave very little to the imagination thanks to her large, hefty bosom and wide, curvy hips swelling out her nightly outfit. Not wanting to keep her servant waiting for much longer, Rozalin pulled the door open to peer outside and find one of her trusted guards, a demon of the Bouncer profession. Though not as tall as those who usually took up the class as a Bouncer, the male demon was still dressed as sharply as one. The demon bodyguard being outfitted in a red tuxedo and a long, black tie wrapped across the collar of his white dress shirt located beneath. Unlike most Bouncers within Rozalin's regime, this one sported a tail that was similar to that of a Beastmaster's. The demon's eyes were slit thin and bright orange in color, belaying the usual trait of Bouncers, while his hair was an odd shade of pale green.

"Breakfast is almost ready and I thought it'd be best to let you know." The tailed bouncer informed the blonde demoness. "Though...you look like you're still getting ready for the day. So, I can tell the cook to hold off a little while longer if you want me to." The bodyguard rarely saw his superior's blonde hair undone, so to see her with it down usually indicated just how early he was in checking up on her.

"Ah, that would be nice. Thank you, Rubicante. Have the chef prepare my favorite meal for this morning when you had back." Rozalin nodded with a faint smile, though, she did not retreat back into her room to get dressed. Instead, the Overlord appeared to hesitate in adding on to her request, Rubicante tilting his head slightly as she appeared to ready to speak on something but, looked apprehensive on airing out whatever was on her mind..

"Something the matter?" The bodyguard inquired, Rozalin shaking her head as she brushed a stray bang of her hair from her face. The overlord opened her mouth to belay Rubicante's worries but, her slender tummy roiled with a loud, rolling grumble of ravenous intent. Silence soon befell the atmosphere between them as Rozalin's fair cheeks burned bright red, her hand hesitantly rubbing on her empty belly. Rubicante didn't seem very disconcerted by the gastric calling for food and merely chuckled as he realized the source of Rozalin's hesitation. "If you're hungrier than usual, I can simply tell the cook to work up more dishes for you. No shame in that, right?"

"True, but try not give me too much, okay?" Rozalin answered, "I maybe a bit more peckish than I normally am but, I do want to watch this figure of mine. As an Overlord, one must keep up their appearance."

"I don't think you're going to get fat from just having a big breakfast..." Rubicante pointed out matter of factly, Rozalin's sharp eyes flattening the gaze on him as she placed her hands akimbo.

"Rubicante..." Rozalin's stern tone snapped the bodyguard back from his words, his hands raised in defense. "You can never be too careful with such delicious foods. I could have a big breakfast one minute and the next thing I know, I can barely see past my feet the next day!"

"But, Lady Rozalin that's not..." Rubicante began to press the subject how many calories she'd need to consume just to end up as a fatty the next day but, the bodyguard found it best not to question his mistress more than twice today. Rozalin may be a proud and haughty demoness but, her mind was a bit closed up thanks to her rarely leaving the castle. According many of her older servants, Rozalin rarely ventured out much of the castle during her days of growing up here and, overtime, she's somewhat adapted to being confined in her mansion and rarely having much initiative to leave. "E-err...nevermind. I'll have Zao prepare your meal as quickly as possible."

"Splendid. I'll be right down once I've gotten dressed for the day." Rozalin turned to return to her quarters, dismissing Rubicante and setting forth to begin her day. Her belly roaring for food as she took a few more steps into her room halted the overlord in her tracks, Rozalin pausing to pat her impatient belly. "...This is most unusual..." She muttered, rummaging in her wardrobe to find an outfit for the day to come...
1251.title: Noble Origins

choices: Lucid Dream of a Tubby Schoolgirl
1253.content:
- Majin Academy's Massive Campaign: A scenario that is centered around two new characters from Absence of Detention, Stella Grossular and Rutile. Retaining her dislike of Evil Academy, Stella seeks to outshine the rivaling school by seeing to it that the demons within her school eat healthy and thus are stronger and better performing. However, while this appears to be a sound plan, there exists a slight problem that may prove to derail Stella's intentions; the fact that someone around the school is proliferating the growth of a new club known as the "Junk Food Brigade" and is causing many of the female students to grow chubby and lethargic. Stella and Rutile then race against the clock to mount a swift offensive against this club and put an end to their fattening ways...of course, this won't be made easier when Stella and Rutile are also under the effects of what's bloating up the female populace of the academy...

- Lucid Dream of a Tubby Schoolgirl: A scenario that focuses on Fuuka (and Desco, if the writer so chooses to include her). Fed up with the food given to Prinnies, Fuuka sets her sights on attaining a meal much more fitting to 'her dream' and does this by venturing out into the Netherworld to a place known only as "Cocytus' Refrigerator", a vast icy region that holds frozen food on it's surface but, a cornucopia of different junk food below ground. Having heard the rumor from several of Hades' prison guards, Fuuka sneaks through the dimensional gate and into the frigid lands where she will finally have a feast truly fitting of her 'dream'. However, Fuuka will soon be swept into an adventure of her own by the resident demons of Cocytus' Refrigerator as well as discovering that the effects over-indulgence are not exempt from her...
1253.title: Even more here~

choices: Even more Ideas? Let's take a looksee...
13.content:
- Beauty Queen's Challenge ~ The Path to Pudginess: Set in a Disgaea: Afternoon of Darkness-ish like storyline. Etna, after having taken Laharl's place as Overlord, is finally discovering what it means to rule over the many demons that used to serve underneath the late prince. However...with this ongoing wave of luxury, the fruits of these 'labors' begin to show on the once slender demoness' now plumping figure. Will this be or will our favored Beauty Queen show them the true meaning of 'big is beautiful'?

- Archangel of Gluttony: Set sometime after the events of Disgaea 4, this scenerio focuses on the exploits of Archangel Flonne. After learning of a show that starred a power angel who ate tons of sweets, Flonne finds herself intruiged and seeks the gain the title of "Archangel of Gluttony". Seeing and doing, however, are two different extremes...will Flonne be able to achieve this new spurt of the moment dream?

- Titanic Final Boss: Set sometime after the events of Disgaea 4, this scenerio focusing on Desco. In this story, Desco (for reasons, I'll leave up to you), has finally become the Final Boss she so dreamed of becoming. However, even after her grand achievement, there still seems to be something missing from her resume that sells her as a 'True Final Boss'. Is it because Desco is too small and skinny to be feared as a final boss? Or maybe it's due to her not having enough 'minions' and thus requires her to spawn more of them? Who knows what the trouble is, but will Desco be able to obtain it and show the demons, humans and angels alike that she's a Final Boss to be reckoned with?

- Magi-Tech Box: The field of Nethersciences, while a rarity, is an interesting field of study and proves to be expanding every day. For the Professor class demon named "Gertrud", it is only natural that she work to create new things through extensive, and perhaps dangerous, experiments. And, with the help of her assistant and long-time friend "Joan" (a Magic Knight), the two of them will work to bring together new (and sometimes dangerous) inventions.
13.title: Netherworld Story 3

choices: Shadow Out of Tubby Times (Weight Gain)
133.content:
It would seem that even though Desco has final boss title under her belt, she's still not recognized as one by the general demonic populace. Is it due to her being too small, or not having enough followers?

- Shadow Out of Tubby Times: "Desco needs to be big and tubby...then she'll be the biggest final boss there ever was!"

- Shub-Niggesco: "M-maybe if Desco makes new vassals she'll be seen as a final boss..."
*Note: Desco will be aged up for this episode.

- Dunwich Vore-er: "Desco will have to eat strong people to be the final boss! ...Now that Desco mentions it...Desco is a little hungry..."
133.title: Titanic Final Boss ~ Episode Selection

134.content:
The two devices Gertrud has cooked up. The scenerios can focus on anyone getting their effects, so, be creative and have fun~?

- Mana Generator Matrix: A device that enhances the production of both Mana and Magic making it an ideal machine for those who want to accel in the magic arts. However, due to the Mana being stored in biological cells of the subject, it usually has rather...fattening results and usually ends with the subject having to sustain a much larger diet to sustain their newly acquired power source.

- Echidna Processer EX: An odd form of magi-tech invented to biologically produce the ideal form of demons to serve under an overlord or netherworld noble. The only catch is that the processor needs both DNA strands and a host to put them in. So...who's gonna test it~?
134.title: Magi-Tech Box ~ Episode Selection

15.content: More blank entries here. Pick one and have fun~
15.title: More? Look here~

info.brief_description: The netherworld is a realm of sin and demons...it's only natural that they expand, right?
info.description:
General Overview
In this interactive we focus on the vast and dangerous realm of the netherworld, a world where beings known as 'demons' reside and live in a society of chaos and backward morals we humans only see as evil. Follow the story of many of you favorite Disgaea characters as they take on both the wiles of the netherworld while challenging the newest threat that's arisen against them; Expansion.

For information regarding the series and it's concepts (WARNING: may contain spoilers) -> http://disgaea.wikia.com/wiki/Disgaea_Wiki

Important Note
NIS (Nippon Ichi Software) games have a tendency to include cameos characters in their games. Disgaea is especially known for this (at least well known for it, since it's on of NIS' more popular creations). This being said, Characters that are within the NIS franchise are allowed to pop in all the same as any other character.


+Fetishes that will appear during this story...+
- Stuffing/Weight Gain
- Pregnancy
- Vore


Standard rules apply...
- Only female characters are to expand. Although this doesn't exclude male characters from appearing at all in the interactive.
- Please put forth effort in your chapters.
- Nothing completely outlandish in regards of expansion.
- Let's try to avoid the overly gross situations such as toilet stuff and the like. Burps are fine (farts too, if you play it for comedy), but nothing past that please.
- This is an 18+ interactive so sexual situations are allowed, just...try not to go overboard with them. Use in moderation, basically and try not to have the story revolve too much around it.
- You see those three fetishes up there in the "Fetishes that will appear during this story" segment? Yeah, those are the only ones this interactive are focusing on. That said, I'd like to ask that you try and stick to those three and not involve any other forms of expansion please >_>
info.pretty_title: Disgaea EX - Rondo of Evil and Expansion
